snippet: A New York rabbi, Arthur Schneier, met with Alan Gross, an imprisoned American, in Havana on Tuesday and described him as upbeat but concerned about family members back home.
abstract: New York rabbi Arthur Schneier meets with Alan Gross, American who is serving a 15-year prison sentence in Cuba for his participation in a democracy-building program there; Schneier says Gross is upbeat, but concerned about his family members in the US.
lead_paragraph: A New York rabbi, Arthur Schneier, met with Alan Gross, an imprisoned American, in Havana on Tuesday and described him as upbeat but concerned about family members back home.
